sentences.en: Acceleration and velocity are both vectors.
sentences.cn: 加速度和速度都是矢量。

sentences.en: An axial vector may itself enter into a vector product.
sentences.cn: 轴矢量自身可参与矢积.

sentences.en: Every vector can be resolved into covariant or into contravariant components.
sentences.cn: 每个矢量都可以分解成协变分量或逆变分量.

sentences.en: For arrays this template is called a dope vector or information vector.
sentences.cn: 我们把这个属性单元称为数组的内情向量或信息向量.

sentences.en: If the wheel is rotating counterclockwise, its angular - momentum vector is directed eastward.
sentences.cn: 如果轮子是逆时针方向旋转, 其角动量矢量的方向朝东.

sentences.en: It is interesting and enlightening to consider the derivative of a vector.
sentences.cn: 这对研究矢量的导数来说是重要的,而且富有启发性.

sentences.en: Multiplies every component of this vector by the same component of scale.
sentences.cn: 由缩放的相同的组件对应乘以这个矢量的每个组件。

sentences.en: Neither vector nor reservoir has been discovered and proved.
sentences.cn: 媒介和贮主至今都没曾得到发现和证实.

sentences.en: Now, how do we get this unit vector?
sentences.cn: 那我们怎么得到这单位矢量呢？

sentences.en: That is transitory or semipersistent in its vector.
sentences.cn: 在它的介体中是属于中间的或半持久的.

sentences.en: The direction of the electric field vector is indicated in each picture.
sentences.cn: 每张照片上都标出了电场矢量的方向.

sentences.en: The radius vector of each solid is always a positive length.
sentences.cn: 每个立体的矢径总是正值长度.

sentences.en: The vector Z is known as the state vector of the system.
sentences.cn: 向量Z称为系统的状态向量.

sentences.en: These are inserted into a cloning vector.
This new tutorial will change the way you use vector graphics.
sentences.cn: 这个新的教程将改变你使用矢量图形的方式。

sentences.en: Vector differences may also be found by the method of rectangular resolution.
sentences.cn: 矢量差也可用正交分解求得.

sentences.en: Vector is a useless survival, or offshoot from quaternions.
sentences.cn: 向量是无用的幸存物或四元数的无价值的支流.

sentences.en: Vector products arise frequently in this book in a number of contexts.
sentences.cn: 在本书的许多场合中经常要出现矢量积.

phrases.tran_cn: 法向量；法向向量；法向矢量

trans.tran_cn: 矢量，航向，[生]带菌者，[天]矢径
trans.tran_en: a quantity such as force that has a direction as well as size
